item.title: Brand New Hatsune Miku Figmas Have Been Unveiled!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
From the geniuses at Max Factory and Good Smile Company comes an announcement that surely will lighten up the hearts of all Hatsune Miku fans – now that two figma figures have been unveiled featuring the worldwide popular, turquoise-twintailed Vocaloid. Hatsune Miku’s New Figmas! The first figma to be unveiled was the “Racing Miku Ver. …

The post Brand New Hatsune Miku Figmas Have Been Unveiled! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
From the geniuses at Max Factory and Good Smile Company comes an announcement that surely will lighten up the hearts of all Hatsune Miku fans – now that two figma figures have been unveiled featuring the worldwide popular, turquoise-twintailed Vocaloid.

Hatsune Miku’s New Figmas!

The first figma to be unveiled was the “Racing Miku Ver. 2020″ from “Hatsune Miku GT Project” in a prototype form. As you can see, the details and coloring have yet to be determined, however Max Factory wanted to give us a small glimpse as of what’s to come for this version of Hatsune Miku. You can appreciate every single small detail put into the figure. We’re very excited to see how the final product is going to look like!

And last but not least is the all new cute “Sakura Miku” in a very spring-like outfit, with small wonderful finishes and touches that gives the figma a special look. While not many details have been revealed so far about this upcoming figma we do know that this colored prototype will be premiered at the Wonder Festival in Tokyo.

Tell us how cute these new figmas are in the comments below!

Sources

Max Factory Official on Twitter

Good Smile Company US on Twitter

The post Brand New Hatsune Miku Figmas Have Been Unveiled! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Winter WonFes 2018 VOCALOID Figure Roundup!
item.dc:creator: Hoshi
item.description:
It’s that time of the year again! Figure manufacturers and garage kit makers flocked to Japan to show off their newest works. In addition, big companies also made lots of announcements about what they plan to make in the future! While the VOCALOID pickings weren’t amazing, they also weren’t slim, either. New Announcements Click the …

The post Winter WonFes 2018 VOCALOID Figure Roundup! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
It’s that time of the year again! Figure manufacturers and garage kit makers flocked to Japan to show off their newest works. In addition, big companies also made lots of announcements about what they plan to make in the future! While the VOCALOID pickings weren’t amazing, they also weren’t slim, either.

New Announcements

Click the figure names for sources!

Hatsune Miku V4 Chinese Scale

1/7 Scale Racing Miku 2018 Ver.

Racing Miku 2017 SPA Support Ver.
1/8 Scale Racing Miku 2017 Thailand Ver.

1/7 Scale Kagamine Rin Stylish Energy R Ver. (Prototype picture source)
1/7 Scale Kagamine Len Stylish Energy L Ver. (Prototype picture source)
Black ★ Rock Shooter inexhaustible Ver. Scale
1/43 Scale GSR AMG 2017 Series Winning Ver.
 

Previously Announced With Updates

These figures were previously announced but have since received either a prototype or a painted prototype.

1/7 Scale Hatsune Miku Kuruwa Kotoba Awase Kagami Ver.

1/7 Scale Kasane Teto Yoshiwara Lament Ver. (More pictures here)

1/8 Scale Racing Miku 2016 Thailand Ver.

figma Miku V4X

Frame Music Girl Hatsune Miku

1/7 Scale Hatsune Miku: Wedding Dress Ver.


Prize Figures

SEGA showed off some upcoming prize figures!

Images from phaius66

Hatsune Miku Jer★Sey Ver.

Hatsune Miku Pieretta Ver.

Hatsune Miku Cabin Attendant Ver.

No Updates but Confirmed to be Still in Production

Unfortunately, not all figures are made quickly. However, there’s confirmation of many figures still being in production!

Still a Prototype

One Miku figure is suffering the treatment of being a prototype for quite some time. While it’s not uncommon, fans are still itching to see the finished product.


Image from phaius66

1/7 Scale Hatsune Miku: Vintage Dress ver.

Still on Production Plans

While these figures haven’t received prototypes yet, they’re still in the running to be figures!

キター！ pic.twitter.com/DuLi2IfcFw

— イットリウムはMIKU9000の一部 (@an39th) February 18, 2018

1/8 Scale “Rin Chan Now!” Adult Rin Ver.

Scale Racing Luka 2017 Ver.

Scale Hatsune Miku: Symphony 2017 Ver.

Nowhere to Be Seen

KAITOが1/4スケール化！
1/4ったらあれですよ、すっごく大きいやつです。 pic.twitter.com/v3VEfhUWte

— オーノシ@グッスマ (@gsc_ohno) February 19, 2017

And on the day after his birthday (WonFes was the 18th in Japan), KAITO was nowhere to be seen. While a 1/4 scale figure of his V3 design was previously announced, his announcement was removed from the production wall. In addition, no pictures of a prototype surfaced online. While it’s unsure if he’s been cancelled, KAITO fans are definitely worried. Stay tuned to VNN as we investigate the Disappearance of 1/4 Scale KAITO.

Ready for Pre-Order

And finally, there’s one item already available for pre-order that was featured at WonFes!

バンダイブース
Figure-rise Bust
初音ミク [リミテッドカラー]（本日分完売）#wf2018w#whl4u pic.twitter.com/TwJARanhkg

— クーちゃろけ@超ボーマス1日目E38 (@phaius66) February 18, 2018

This limited metallic colored version of the Figure-rise Bust Vocaloid Hatsune Miku sold out during WonFes! You can pre-order her at Tokyo Otaku Mode, though!

TOM at Winter WonFes 2018 Sale

In addition you can check out the Tokyo Otaku Mode at Winter WonFes 2018 sale here. They have select figures up to 20% off PLUS up to 20x TOM points on figure pre-orders for Premium Members. Your first three months of Premium are only $4.99 USD as well!

Deals end Feb. 19, 2018, 11:59pm (PST)

As always, stay tuned to VNN for when the figures are released!

The post Winter WonFes 2018 VOCALOID Figure Roundup! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Snow Miku 2018 Nendoroid, Figma, And Tour Accommodations Open! Street Car Schedule Detailed
item.dc:creator: mikufan.com
item.description:
If you’re looking at grabbing your Snow Miku 2018 Nendoroid and Figma early during your visit to Snow Miku 2018, live event tickets and possibly some flight and hotel accommodations, the Snow Miku 2018 tour package site is now online! A special gift this year is a Snow Miku themed portable battery pack for those …

The post Snow Miku 2018 Nendoroid, Figma, And Tour Accommodations Open! Street Car Schedule Detailed appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
If you’re looking at grabbing your Snow Miku 2018 Nendoroid and Figma early during your visit to Snow Miku 2018, live event tickets and possibly some flight and hotel accommodations, the Snow Miku 2018 tour package site is now online!

A special gift this year is a Snow Miku themed portable battery pack for those booking their Snow Miku 2018 nendoroid and exhibition ticket with their registration.

To register and check out all available package offers, head over to the official Snow Miku 2018 tour site! → https://conv.toptour.co.jp/2018/snowmiku2018/index_en.html

Snow Miku 2017 street car design

Lastly, if you’d like to check out and ride the yearly Snow Miku wrapped street car, it will begin operation on November 27th and run daily until March 27th, 2018, between the hours of 7:00 AM and 6:00 PM. There will be an early reveal exhibition on November 26th between 10:30 AM and 2:00 PM at the following location: 札幌市中央区南21条西16丁目

Snow Miku 2018 Official Site: http://snowmiku.com/2018/

Source: Mikufan.com

The post Snow Miku 2018 Nendoroid, Figma, And Tour Accommodations Open! Street Car Schedule Detailed appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Figma Racing Miku 2016: TeamUKYO Support ver. Preorders Now Open
item.dc:creator: mikufan.com
item.description:
The Figma Racing Miku 2016: TeamUKYO Support ver. is now available for preorder! The figma is based on an original design by Mai Yoneyama, Racing Miku 2016’s illustrator, to cheer on for Good Smile Racing and TeamUKYO’s bicycle racing team! The 2016 edition of Racing Miku is here to cheer on for TeamUKYO! GOODSMILE RACING …

The post Figma Racing Miku 2016: TeamUKYO Support ver. Preorders Now Open appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The Figma Racing Miku 2016: TeamUKYO Support ver. is now available for preorder! The figma is based on an original design by Mai Yoneyama, Racing Miku 2016’s illustrator, to cheer on for Good Smile Racing and TeamUKYO’s bicycle racing team!

The 2016 edition of Racing Miku is here to cheer on for TeamUKYO!

GOODSMILE RACING & TeamUKYO’s team manager Ukyo Katayama also leads a bicycle team called TeamUKYO, and Racing Miku is here to cheer them on! This special design of the 2016 edition of Racing Miku has now been transformed into a figma for fans to enjoy by their side.

  • The smooth yet posable figma joints allow you to act out a variety of different scenes.
  • A flexible plastic is used in specific areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
  • She comes with both a cheerful smiling expression and a more serious, confident expression.
  • Optional parts include a drink bottle as well as a partially pre-painted plastic model kit for a bicycle.
  • An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.

Preorders are now open on Good Smile Company’s online for 8,300 yen (~$76 USD) until September 28th at 12:00 JST, with release scheduled for February 2018. She’s also available at other online shops. Check out the links below!

> Tokyo Otaku Mode
> CDJapan
> GSC Online Shop
> Amiami
> Hobby Search

Official Product Page → http://www.goodsmile.info/en/product/6678/

The post Figma Racing Miku 2016: TeamUKYO Support ver. Preorders Now Open appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Summer WonFes 2017 VOCALOID Figures Recap!
item.dc:creator: Hoshi
item.description:
It’s that time of year again where figure companies from all over Japan meet in the biggest biannual figure convention in Japan. While fans from all over the world attend this event, even those at home can join in. The #wf2017s hashtag is where all the WonFes action is at. However, please note that scrolling …

The post Summer WonFes 2017 VOCALOID Figures Recap! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
It’s that time of year again where figure companies from all over Japan meet in the biggest biannual figure convention in Japan. While fans from all over the world attend this event, even those at home can join in. The #wf2017s hashtag is where all the WonFes action is at. However, please note that scrolling through isn’t safe for work. While WonFes is full of pure and innocent figures, there are also quite a few lewd ones that some fans may not want to see. Of course that’s where VNN comes in! Our WonFes summaries bring you all the VOCALOID goodness without any sifting through Twitter. So let’s get to our Summer WonFes 2017 VOCALOID figures recap!

Hatsune Miku

With Hatsune Miku’s 10th Anniversary right around the corner, there are bound to be some celebratory figures. And we weren’t disappointed! Click on the figure name for the image source. And, as always, a huge thanks to MikuFan for compiling all the Miku figures!

Nendoroid Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 5th Anniversary Ver.
Manufacturer: Good Smile Company
Release Date: TBA
Price: TBA

Hatsune Miku: Harvest Moon ver. 1/8 Scale
Manufacturer: Good Smile Company
Release Date: TBA
Price: TBA

figma Hatsune Miku: V4X ver.
Manufacturer: Max Factory
Release Date: TBA
Price: TBA

Hatsune Miku: Winter Heroine ver. 1/8 scale
Manufacturer: Max Factory
Release Date: TBA
Price: TBA

figma Racing Miku: TeamUKYO 2016 ver.
Manufacturer: Max Factory
Release Date: TBA
Price: TBA

Nendoroid Hatsune Miku: 10th Anniversary ver.
Manufacturer: Good Smile Company
Release Date: TBA
Price: TBA

Hatsune Miku: 10th Anniversary ver. 1/7 scale
Manufacturer: Good Smile Company
Release Date: TBA
Price: TBA

Hatsune Miku: Vintage Dress ver. 1/7 scale
Manufacturer: Max Factory
Release Date: TBA
Price: TBA

Racing Miku 2017 ver. Non-scale
Manufacturer: Good Smile Company
Release Date: TBA
Price: TBA

Racing Miku 2017 ver. (Unknown Scale)
Manufacturer: (Unknown, spotted at AMAKUNI booth)
Release Date: TBA
Price: TBA

Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2017 ver. 1/7 scale
Manufacturer: F:NEX
Release Date: TBA
Price: TBA

Please note that the following images were uploaded by the original poster in a format that altered the colors. Please see the flyer shown here as well as later in this article for a better representation of what the announcements look like.

Hatsune Miku: Wedding Dress ver. 1/7 scale
Manufacturer: FREEing
Release Date: TBA
Price: TBA

Racing Miku 2016: Thailand Cheer ver. 1/8 scale
Manufacturer: FREEing
Release Date: TBA
Price: TBA

Hatsune Miku: My Dear Bunny ver. 1/4 scale
Manufacturer: FREEing
Release Date: TBA
Price: TBA

Other VOCALOIDs

Of course, other VOCALOIDs received some love as well! Rin, KAITO, and Yukari all have some more official figures coming your way.

Please note that the stand-alone images were uploaded by the original poster in a format that altered their color. The flyer shown after the two announcement images has a better representation of the actual announcement images. You can find the flyer source here.

KAITO V3 1/4 scale
Manufacturer: FREEing
Release Date: TBA
Price: TBA

“Rin Chan Now!” Adult Rin Ver. 1/8 scale
Manufacturer: FREEing
Release Date: TBA
Price: TBA

Yuzuki Yukari Phone Holder
Manufacturer: Pulchra
Release Date: TBA
Price: TBA

Other Items

While WonFes is all about new figure announcements, other, previously announced items were also displayed at the event.

GSRブース
1/32スケール
グッドスマイル初音ミクAMG SPA24h Ver.#wf2017s pic.twitter.com/py1dapvMaM

— クーちゃろけ (@phaius66) July 30, 2017

The Good Smile Hatsune Miku AMG 2017 SPA24H Ver. Scale Miniature finally has a finished prototype! You can read more about the scale miniature here.

The retail price is ¥11,852 JPY (about $105 USD), but shops may have it priced lower or higher. The miniature car is set to release in January of 2018, but some websites may ship it later. Below are some of the websites where you can pre-order from.

CDJapan

Tokyo Otaku Mode

Good Smile Online Shop

AmiAmi

DDミクさん新衣装。#wf2017s pic.twitter.com/eQIkLPLPYR

— しぶさわ (@ShibusawaRocket) July 30, 2017

The “Deep Sea Girl” Dollfie Dream outfit for Miku was on display as well!

星尘。#wf2017s pic.twitter.com/1hbexBbn3L

— しぶさわ (@ShibusawaRocket) July 30, 2017

Stardust made an appearance with her 1/8 scale Swimsuit Ver. figure. You can read more about it here.

Pre-order Links

CDJapan: ¥9,310 JPY (About $84 USD)

Tokyo Otaku Mode ($105 USD)

AmiAmi: ¥9,890 JPY (About $89 USD)

HobbySearch: ¥9,310 JPY (About $84 USD)

HobbyLink Japan: ¥9,800 JPY (About $91 USD)

ストロンガー 鏡音リン ～花色衣～ #wf2017s #WF2017夏 pic.twitter.com/M5pIVJwUXZ

— whitenoize (@whitenoize) July 30, 2017

ストロンガー 鏡音レン ～花色衣～ #wf2017s #WF2017夏 pic.twitter.com/TAwa93DbW5

— whitenoize (@whitenoize) July 30, 2017

The Kagamine Rin & Len Hanairogoromo figures both made an appearance! You can find more information on these two here. You can grab both of them online as well if you’d like to add them to your collection!

Purchase Rin Online

Tokyo Otaku Mode – $147.59 USD

AmiAmi – ¥12,800 (About $114 USD)

Tokyo Figure – ¥12,800 (About $114 USD)

Purchase Len Online

Tokyo Otaku Mode – $147.59 USD

AmiAmi – ¥12,800 (About $114 USD)

Tokyo Figure – ¥12,800 (About $114 USD)

等身大ゆかりさんポリスいた。良く出来てる。 pic.twitter.com/P9hKv6NDCJ

— すぎ (@sugipack) July 30, 2017

FIGUREX’s life-sized Yuzuki Yukari Police Ver. figure was on display as well, complete with a police station backdrop! You can read more about it here.

Also on display were Pulchra’s 1/8 scale Yuzuki Yukari Police Ver. and Kappōgi Ver. figures, which recently went back up on the market! You can read more about both figures here.

Life-Sized Yuzuki Yukari Police Ver. Pre-order Link

FIGUREX Online Store: ￥1,280,000 (About $11581.82 USD)

1/8 Scale Yuzuki Yukari Police Ver. Figure Pre-order Links

Pulchra Online Store: ￥14,904 (About $134.81 USD)

AHS Store: ￥14,904 (About $134.81 USD)

1/8 Scale Yuzuki Yukari Kappōgi Ver. Figure Pre-order Links

Pulchra Online Store: ￥14,904 (About $134.81 USD)

AHS Store: ￥14,904 (About $134.81 USD)

明日30日幕張メッセにて開催されるワンダーフェスティバル２０１７夏【結月ゆかりレーシング】は8ホール卓番「8-20-02」にてグッズの販売をいたします！。レーシングゆかりさんもお待ちしています。是非おいでください。#wf2017s #WF2017夏
新作あります! pic.twitter.com/LFljp0HymR

— 結月ゆかりレーシング (@yukari_racing) July 29, 2017

設営完了!
はじっこの8ホールの 20-02でお待ちしております! pic.twitter.com/TSM807fRXP

— 結 WF8-20-02 (@alienaizeryou) July 30, 2017

And last but not least, representatives from the Yuzuki Yukari Racing team were present at Summer WonFes 2017 as well! While they didn’t have any figures, they still brought along plenty of merch to satisfy any Racing Yukari fan, including three brand new items!

Racing Yukari Sticker (smartphone size): ￥2,000 (About $18.00 USD)
Racing Yukari Car Decal Sticker (13cm): ￥2,000 (About $18.00 USD)
Racing Yukari Car Decal Sticker (20cm): ￥3,000 (About $27.00 USD)
SD Racing Yukari Key Chain: ￥1,000 (About $9.00 USD)
SD Racing Yukari Can Badge: ￥1,000 (About $9.00 USD)

*New*
Racing Yukari Mug: ￥2,000 (About $18.00 USD)
Racing Yukari Cotton Tote Bag + Team Towel Set: ￥4,000 (About $36.00 USD)

As always, stay tuned to VNN for more information on when the announced figures are released!

The post Summer WonFes 2017 VOCALOID Figures Recap! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Nendoroid & Figma Racing Miku 2017 Sponsorship Courses Now Open
item.dc:creator: mikufan.com
item.description:
Goodsmile Racing has opened the Nendoroid & Figma Racing Miku 2017 sponsorship courses! The Nendoroid Racing Miku 2017 was showcased earlier at Winter Wonder Festival, while the Figma has yet to make her appearance. Applications will be open until March 8th. All goods are scheduled to release in November 2017, with the exceptions of personal sponsor …

The post Nendoroid & Figma Racing Miku 2017 Sponsorship Courses Now Open appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Goodsmile Racing has opened the Nendoroid & Figma Racing Miku 2017 sponsorship courses! The Nendoroid Racing Miku 2017 was showcased earlier at Winter Wonder Festival, while the Figma has yet to make her appearance.

Applications will be open until March 8th. All goods are scheduled to release in November 2017, with the exceptions of personal sponsor card, ticket holder, and Nendoroid Racing Miku 2017 Ver. acrylic key chain vol. 1 that’ll be shipped after applications.

Let’s show our support for GSR once again this year!

Sponsorship Course Page: http://gsr-global.ecq.sc/

Nendoroid Racing Miku 2017 Sponsorship courses

8,000 Yen Course

  • Personal Sponsor Card
  • Ticket Holder
  • Nendoroid Racing Miku 2017 Ver.
  • Nendoroid Racing Miku 2017 Ver. Acrylic Key Chain Vol. 1
  • Nendoroid Racing Miku 2017 Ver. Acrylic Key Chain Vol. 2

15,000 Yen Course

  • All the benefits from 8,000 yen course
  • Racing Miku 2017 Microfiber Hand Towel (2-Variety Set)
  • Racing Miku 2017 Mini Pouch

30,000 Yen Course

  • All the benefits from 15,000 yen course
  • Goodsmile Racing Hip-Pack
  • Camouflage Tee

50,000 Yen Course

  • All the benefits from 30,000 yen course
  • Stand Collar Zip-Up Racing Jacket

70,000 Yen Course

  • All the benefits from 50,000 yen tier
  • Camouflage Tee (Extra)
  • Full-Graphic Shirt w/Back Pockets A

Figma Racing Miku 2017 Sponsorship courses

8,000 Yen Course

  • Personal Sponsor Card
  • Ticket Holder
  • figma Racing Miku 2017 Ver.
  • Nendoroid Racing Miku 2017 Ver. Acrylic Key Chain Vol. 1
  • Racing Miku 2017 Sticker

15,000 Yen Course

  • All the benefits from 8,000 yen course
  • 2017 Personal Sponsor Cap
  • #4 Theme Folding Parasol

30,000 Yen Course

  • All the benefits from 15,000 yen course
  • 1/32 Scale Mini-Car: Goodsmile Hatsune Miku AMG 2017 Personal Sponsor Ver.
  • Polo Shirt

50,000 Yen Course

  • All the benefits from 30,000 yen course
  • Zipper-Front Hoodie w/Detachable Sleeves

70,000 Yen Course

  • All the benefits from 50,000 yen course
  • Polo Shirt (Extra)
  • Full-Graphic Shirt w/Back Pockets B

The post Nendoroid & Figma Racing Miku 2017 Sponsorship Courses Now Open appeared first on VNN.

item.title: MEIKO Figma Pre-orders Are Now Open!
item.dc:creator: Hoshi
item.description:
After much anticipation, the MEIKO figma pre-orders are finally open! Fans can grab MEIKO on the Good Smile Online Shop now! Ordering Pre-orders for the MEIKO figma will be open from November 25th, 2016, to December 22nd unless the pre-order quota is met. You can order MEIKO from many different shops and she’ll cost you …

The post MEIKO Figma Pre-orders Are Now Open! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
After much anticipation, the MEIKO figma pre-orders are finally open! Fans can grab MEIKO on the Good Smile Online Shop now!

Ordering

Pre-orders for the MEIKO figma will be open from November 25th, 2016, to December 22nd unless the pre-order quota is met.

You can order MEIKO from many different shops and she’ll cost you around ¥6,000 JPY ($53 USD) before tax. She’s set to release in May 2017.

CDJapan
Good Smile Company
AmiAmi

More pre-order links will be added as websites update.

Optional Parts

Just like every other figma, the MEIKO figma has lots of optional parts! She has a smiling face, a winking face, and a singing face. In addition, she also comes with a microphone and mic stand, as well as a mic cable. She also has a pleated skirt option that mimics her Project DIVA module!

If you love MEIKO, this figma is a must-have for your collection! It marks the second non-prize figure for the first female Japanese VOCALOID, the first being the 1/8 scale Hanairogoromo Ver. figure.

The post MEIKO Figma Pre-orders Are Now Open! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Fully Painted MEIKO figma Revealed During MEIKO’s Birthday Celebrations!
item.dc:creator: Hoshi
item.description:
November 5th marks MEIKO’s birthday and, just like with all of their other VOCALOIDs, Crypton is celebrating. Most notably for fans who have been waiting for almost a year, the much anticipated MEIKO figma is finally fully painted! She was first announced in February of 2016 at Winter Wonfes and had an unpainted prototype at Summer …

The post Fully Painted MEIKO figma Revealed During MEIKO’s Birthday Celebrations! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
November 5th marks MEIKO’s birthday and, just like with all of their other VOCALOIDs, Crypton is celebrating. Most notably for fans who have been waiting for almost a year, the much anticipated MEIKO figma is finally fully painted! She was first announced in February of 2016 at Winter Wonfes and had an unpainted prototype at Summer Wonfes. Now she’s painted and ready to go!

According the Piapro blog post, the figma has a Spring 2017 release date and pre-orders are going to open soon.

The price is to be announced, however, that should be coming soon.

At the moment, there’s only one picture of the MEIKO figma available. Once pre-orders open, there will be more pictures as well as a price and an exact month for expected release (there’s always the chance of a delay).

When Good Smile Company opens the pre-orders, we’ll be sure to let everyone know. Until then, keep an eye out for any more updates!

 

Other Celebrations

There are a few more events going on to celebrate MEIKO’s birthday as well. Did you know this is her 12th anniversary? She’s been around for quite some time!

MEIKO Themed Giveaway

Piapro’s blog was decorated in a MEIKO theme and they are also hosting a giveaway for MEIKO fans. You can find it on the blog post here. Entrants can win MEIKO’s V3 (1 person), a signed Project DIVA Arcade MEIKO prize figure + an assortment of MEIKO goods (1 person), a signed MEIKO T-shirt + an assortment MEIKO goods (1 person), a MEIKO Nendoroid Petit Set + an assortment of MEIKO goods (3 people), and an assortment of MEIKO goods (6 people).

There’s only a Japanese version of the entry form, so it’s only open to those who know Japanese. The entry period ends on November 18th.

KARENT Special

KARENT is featuring eight new MEIKO singles and four new MEIKO-filled albums for fans to purchase. You can check them out here.

Birthday Wish from Haigou Meiko

Haigou Meiko, MEIKO’s voice actress, also wished MEIKO a happy birthday! Below is a rough translation of the message posted on the Piapro blog. Please note that this is not a word-for-word translation:

12 years, it’s such a long time isn’t it, feels like they’ve gone by quite fast. It’s quite amazing.
We do so many things these days and yet she’s still singing as happily as always.
For everyone who is always sending lots of love to her, thank you very much.
And we wish that she can still sing with great feeling for everyone.
And I want to stay beside her and watch her do that!
– From Meiko Haigō

Happy birthday, MEIKO! May we hear your voice for years to come.

Source: Hatsune Miku Official Blog

The post Fully Painted MEIKO figma Revealed During MEIKO’s Birthday Celebrations! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Snow Miku 2017 Revealed and Official Site Now Open
item.dc:creator: marumain
item.description:
Alongside the unveiling of next year’s Snow Miku at Magical Mirai 2016’s Sponsor Exhibit, Crypton has opened the official Snow Miku 2017 site. Next year’s Snow Miku festival logo follows a dazzling, gorgeous shooting star-like motif with the dates set for Monday, February 6th to Sunday, February 12th, 2017. The theme will be “Starry, Constellation-Filled …

The post Snow Miku 2017 Revealed and Official Site Now Open appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Alongside the unveiling of next year’s Snow Miku at Magical Mirai 2016’s Sponsor Exhibit, Crypton has opened the official Snow Miku 2017 site.

Next year’s Snow Miku festival logo follows a dazzling, gorgeous shooting star-like motif with the dates set for Monday, February 6th to Sunday, February 12th, 2017. The theme will be “Starry, Constellation-Filled Winter Sky Over Hokkaido.” And as was announced at Magical Mirai 2016, 2017’s Snow Miku is being designed by piapro artist Nishina / 西品＿にしな, and the rabbit Yukine by LF, both brought to life by their designs!

Also, let’s not forget that Nendoroid and figma figures of Snow Miku 2017 and Yukine are in the works at Good Smile Company and Max Factory! Here, from the official site, we see a line-up of all Snow Mikus released so far. I can’t wait to see how their completed 8th Nendoroid figure will look!

  • SNOW MIKU 2017 Official Site

Originally written by Kowhey of VNN Japan.

The post Snow Miku 2017 Revealed and Official Site Now Open appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Summer Wonder Festival 2016 Highlights
item.dc:creator: Hoshi
item.description:
Every Wonder Festival is bound to please and this summer’s was no different. Summer WonFes 2016 not only provided us with some awesome new Miku figures to look forward to, but also covered the VOCALOID spectrum all the way to China! There was quite a bit of Miku but Luka, Rin, and Len took the …

The post Summer Wonder Festival 2016 Highlights appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Every Wonder Festival is bound to please and this summer’s was no different. Summer WonFes 2016 not only provided us with some awesome new Miku figures to look forward to, but also covered the VOCALOID spectrum all the way to China! There was quite a bit of Miku but Luka, Rin, and Len took the stage on top of that. In addition, IA and ONE made an appearance as well as Stardust. It was a super busy WonFes!

Hatsune Miku Figures

As always, there’s lots of Miku figures! For image sources, click the names in the bulleted list. All of our Miku figure information is from MikuFan. They uploaded a nice gallery of all the Miku figures on Facebook.

Magical Mirai 2016 Miku Nendoroid – No price or release date announced.
Snow Miku 1/8 Scale – No price or release date announced.
Hatsune Miku: Heart Hunter Ver. 1/7 Scale – No price or release date announced.
Racing Miku 2016 1/8 Scale – Price Unannounced. Will be available this autumn.
Hatsune Miku: Rage of Bahamut (unknown scale size) – No price or release date announced.
Racing Miku 2016 Prize Figure – Set for October 2016 release.
2D Dream Fever Miku 1/8 Scale – No price or release date announced.
Thailand Racing Miku 2015 1/8th Scale – No price or release date announced.
Hatsune Miku: Project Diva X Ver. Prize Figure – Set for December 2016 release.

Previously Announced Figures

Some figures were announced a while ago but appeared at WonFes so that they could be shown off in all their glory. In addition, we finally got prototypes of several highly anticipated figures!

1/12 Scale Kagamine Rin and Len Swimsuit Versions

Last WonFes, we saw a teaser silhouette of these two in what appeared to be swimsuits. It’s been confirmed that they are part of the 1/12 scale ‘SMALL & STYLISH’, or S-style for short, line. There’s no release date known at the moment. However, Kagamine fans can look forward to affordable figures of these two! The S-style figures retail for around $30 USD, give or take a few dollars.

Image Source: Twitter @phaius66

MEIKO Figma

MEIKO fans have only been waiting a year for this prototype! She was announced during Summer WonFes 2015 and has finally come to life! While the prototype isn’t painted yet, there’s still progress!

Image Source: Twitter @phaius66

KAITO and MEIKO Hanairogoromo Ver.

We saw teasers of these two just a few days ago, and now their faces have finally been revealed! These two are set to release in May 2017 with pre-orders opening July 29th and remaining open until some time in September or until the pre-order limit is reached.

Image Source: Twitter @odatsuyoshi

1/8 Scale Stardust

The much-anticipated 1/8 scale Stardust figure finally has a painted prototype. We covered the original prototype reveal in May and now we’re happy to show the update to the project! There’s no known release date for this figure at the moment. However, we’ll be sure to keep fans updated.

Image Source: Weibo User VC相关推广站
Image Source: aminews Twitter

1/4 Scale Megurine Luka V4X

Luka fans, rejoice! There’s finally a prototype for the 1/4 scale Luka V4X figure. This unpainted version was even displayed next to the 1/4 scale Miku V3 figure. There’s no set release date for this figure at the moment but Luka fans should start saving. The 1/4 scales are rather pricey.

Image source: Twitter @phaius66

1/8 Scale IA ROCKS and ONE

These two figures have been teased for quite a while now. They were finally given a release date though! They’ll be available in 2017. At the moment, the prices are to be determined.

Image Sources: Twitter @haruto153 (IA) (ONE)

Kagamine Rin and Len Dollfie Dream

We’ve covered the Kagamine Dollfies before but they made an appearance at WonFes. It’s interesting to see the two when not photographed specifically for product photos. A lot of information has been released about these two as well. You can see Rin’s product page in English here and Len’s here.

The two dolls are set to ship in October. Fans interested in purchasing them can check out our article here for more information on them as well as how to get them if you don’t live in Japan.

Rin will cost 70,000 yen (plus a fee) while Len will cost 75,000 yen (plus a fee) for overseas buyers.

In addition, the body suits for those who don’t want to put the “02” decals on their Dollfies will cost another 3,000 yen plus a fee.

At the moment, there’s no word on how much these fees will be.

New Figure Announcements

There weren’t many new figures outside of the realm of Miku. However, there’s another figure for Luka fans and even a Nendoroid Co-De for Len lovers.

The 1/7 scale Megurine Luka Temptation ver. along with the Nendoroid Co-De Kagamine Len Trickster (Tricker) ver. were on the wall of upcoming projects. While there aren’t any prototypes for them yet, fans of these two VOCALOIDs can look forward to the planned releases.

Image Sources: Summer WonFes 2016 Online Gallery (Luka) and Twitter @me_yamaneko (Len)

Prize Figures

Sega has quite the prize figure lineup this time around! Here’s the list with pictures shown below it. Click the names of the figures to go to the image source.

  • Megurine Luka Amour Ver. – Release Date: September.
  • Hatsune Miku Innocent Ver. – Release Date: August.
  • KAITO Guilty Ver. – Release Date: July.
  • Hatsune Miku Christmas Outfit – Release Date: October.
  • Kagamine Rin Christmas Outfit – Release Date: November.

The post Summer Wonder Festival 2016 Highlights appeared first on VNN.
